content: handbrake i am stunned to find myself releasing a pattern it is thats what we have tried to achieve with empowered totally by my knitting yoda kay jones handbrake our plan was to release this pattern free as a thank you to all of you who supported me whilst undergoing chemotherapy in 2014 my through the dark days of my illness as we hands swelled and were unable to work the completed the pattern that plan changed needles i began to dream of knitting something new and exciting one evening we sat and talked why don t we use this pattern to give something about my favourite hat pattern and we discussed back to a cause that will in all likelihood help all of the outline of what has become the pattern below us cancer research so that is what we have decided to do every penny raised through sales of my inspiration for handbrake was to create a handbrake will go towards helping find a cure for garment you could knit for a guy i wondered could cancer i create something understatedly hand knit that would float under their yarn radar thank you so much for buying handbrake how amazing it is to think that as a community we can as we progressed it has become so much more come together knit something lovely maybe inspire what if we could create a pattern that looks great some new knitters and help find a cure for cancer on girls as well as guys what if we could create the too ultimate tv or car knitting that once you get going with just flows © kay & dan jones handbrake for personal use only -
